Permission.label: Permission
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission for use of command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission info
PermissionInfo.tooltip:
Leave blank, type a number or the specific users
(like this: User1 User2 User3 User4)

SoundWarning.label: Sound when warning
SoundWarning.tooltip: The filename to the sound that you want to play when -w is used. (turn audio to 0 for no sound at all)

SoundWarningVolume.label: Volume for -w sound
SoundWarningVolume.tooltip:
Volume of the sound when -w is used.
Under 100: lower than normal
100: normal
Above 100: higher than normal

SoundAnnounce.label: Sound when announcing
SoundAnnounce.tooltip: The filename to the sound that you want to play when -a is used. (turn audio to 0 for no sound at all)

SoundAnnounceVolume.label: Volume for -a sound
SoundAnnounceVolume.tooltip:
Volume of the sound when -a is used.
Under 100: lower than normal
100: normal
Above 100: higher than normal

SoundKeyCode.label: Sound when colorname or hexcode is used
SoundKeyCode.tooltip: The filename to the sound that you want to play when a colorname or hexcode is used. (turn audio to 0 for no sound at all)

SoundKeyCodeVolume.label: Sound volume when colorname or hexcode is used
SoundKeyCodeVolume.tooltip:
Volume of the sound when colorname or hex is used.
Under 100: lower than normal
100: normal
Above 100: higher than normal

BackgroundColorKeyCode.label: Background color when colorname or hexcode is used

TextColorKeyCode.label: Text color when colorname or hexcode is used

OpenInfoFile.label: Open information file
OpenInfoFile.tooltip:
Open information file.
Not working? Reload the script settings window (leftclick on annother script and then back)

Reload.label: Reload
Reload.tooltip:
Reload the script settings (save first).
Not working? Reload the script settings window (leftclick on annother script and then back)

OpenDir.label: Sound files
OpenDir.tooltip:
Reload the script settings (save first).
Not working? Reload the script settings window (leftclick on annother script and then back)
